alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:51PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 715 PM CDT/615 PM MDT/... At 650 PM CDT/550 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, or 20 miles south of Valentine, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Sparks, Big Alkali Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Smith Falls State Park and Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 202 and 213. Highway 83 between mile markers 188 and 207. Highway 12 between mile markers 16 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for north central Nebraska.
